structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 407, sec. 26, effective July 1, 1980. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 17, effective July 1, 1976. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 61, sec. 1. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 336, sec. 2. -- Repealed and reenacted 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 197, secs. 3 and 4. -- Created 1963 (3d Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 2, secs. 2 and 4.
